=== Steve Conklin ===

Email: 
I'm Steve Conklin. I'm a member of the Ubuntu Kernel Team,
and work for Canonical onthe Ubuntu Kernel. Currently I am
working with the QA team helping to improve kernel testing.

My launchpad page <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~sconklin|is here]]</nowiki>.

I've been active in open source development for over ten years,
and am a contributor to several upstream projects including
cwpcm and hamlib.

I keep a blog <nowiki>[[http://www.illruminations.com|here]]</nowiki> which I try to keep current with Ubuntu news.

rteval info for ubuntu: <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SteveConklin/rteval]]</nowiki>
